1236 Trump’s Border Policy Delivers: Zero Illegal Alien Releases for 6th Month, Record-Low Apprehensions in October (www.breitbart.com) AMERICA        FIRST posted 5 days ago by TEXinLA 53 comments award share report block Trump’s Border Policy Delivers: Zero Migrant Releases for 6th Month, Record-Low Apprehensions in October The Trump administration’s border crackdown is delivering results: October 2025 marked the lowest number of illegal border crossings in CBP history, and it was the sixth straight month of zero releases by U.S. Border Patrol. With just 30,561 encounters nat... www.breitbart.com
53 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save MissingTrump 50 points 5 days ago Good. Now ship back the ones that are already here. permalink award report block reply GoUSA 25 points 5 days ago Exactly. It's a start, but our administration has clearly given a sign to corporate America that they get to keep their 50 million indentured servants . It would only take one perp walked CEO, before they send them all back. permalink parent award report block reply BeauHD 11 points 5 days ago Homan is doing what Homan is able to do. permalink parent award report block reply YouEssAye 4 points 5 days ago If he's doing all that he can do, and that's not even close to being enough, at what point can we hold him or his boss accountable? permalink parent award report block reply YodaBannon 1 points 5 days ago You got to know when to HOMAN, know when to fold em. 🍻 permalink parent award report block reply KernalMustard 2 points 5 days ago So know when to bluff or show your cards even though its a losing hand? I think you didnt think that through permalink parent award report block reply tt777 3 points 5 days ago There need to be a heavy fine for each illegal employed by a company. permalink parent award report block reply FatigueIsReal -1 points 5 days ago So then what about these CEOs that have been arrested.  You said one is all it takes right? Andy Ha, Owner/CEO of Prosperity Services Inc. Leonardo Baez-Lara and Nora Alicia Avila-Guel, Owners of Abby's Bakery Zhu "George" Chen, Owner of Wellmade Industries Robert Clouston and Brenda Clouston, Owners of Colt Grill John Washburn, General Manager of San Diego Powder & Protective Coatings Edit: MTG could be perp walked.  She claimed in an interview that she owns a construction company and that construction companies rely on illegals. permalink parent award report block reply AwShitHereWeGoAgain 6 points 5 days ago You're goddamn right!  Pump up those numbers! permalink parent award report block reply TEXinLA OP 2 points 3 days ago ^^THIS^^ permalink parent award report block reply TEXinLA OP 18 points 5 days ago From the article: During the month of October, Border Patrol agents apprehended approximately 8,000 migrants who illegally crossed the border between ports of entry. Officials say this represents an arrest rate of 258 illegal aliens per day — less than 11 per hour. During the Biden administration, agents were overwhelmed with an average apprehension rate of more than 5,100 per day. One year ago, agents apprehended more than 300 illegal aliens every four hours. permalink award report block reply bigdickhangsright 18 points 5 days ago It's... almost... as if border control works for sovereign countries and the Democrats intentionally tried to destroy our nation. permalink award report block reply Oleander 8 points 5 days ago They succeeded in doing so. Things are going to get a lot worse before they get better, far too many were already let in. That's not to mention border security is now a political issue instead of bipartisan, so Democrats will do their best to reverse all security once they get back in, possibly even do mass amnesty. permalink parent award report block reply TEXinLA OP 1 points 3 days ago WEIRD HUH? permalink parent award report block reply RandyMoss 9 points 5 days ago I'm at the DMV right now. Rural MN. 50% of the people here don't speak English. Trump isn't doing shit. It's all optics. permalink award report block reply UCantStumpTheTrump 0 points 5 days ago lol bitch some more doomer, Trump is currently doing the biggest deportation and immigration enforcement operations in our lifetimes, and it’s not good enough for you. You know what was optics? When Obama changed the definition of “deported” to include those simply turned away at the border, so they could inflate their deportation statistics permalink parent award report block reply RandyMoss 1 points 5 days ago That isn't really saying anything, sadly. In defense of Trump it may take time to build the systems and infrastructure to accommodate the numbers that need deporting.  That's an optimistic view.
A pessimistic view (doomer if you insist) recognizes that branding and noise are what Trump specializes in. Results? A lot less. Is it his fault? Ultimately yes because he keeps trying to work with the traitor RINOs instead of demanding they work with him or get the boot. Trump has really lost me when he picks fights with Massie and Paul on legislation that was WRITTEN BY THE BIDEN ADMINISTRATION!!!  How do you reconcile that? permalink parent award report block reply UCantStumpTheTrump 1 points 5 days ago Literally no other GOP politician even had the political will to touch the idea of a border wall or deportations with a ten foot pole, much less actually get those efforts underway. Once again, your claim of “no results” is provably false. We need to crank it up across the board. Every single workplace should be investigated and raided. Every single illegal needs to be round up and shipped back. The deportation strategy needs to change too..no more 3 ICE agents wrestling one Mexican into handcuffs for 15 minutes. Spot an illegal, taze the fuck out of them, put a bag over their head and drive them immediately to the closest air force base where a c-130 is waiting. Fill the c-130. They wait there with the bags on their heads until the c-130 is filled then it immediately takes off and they're deported. Rinse and repeat. No housing, no beds, no food or water just straight from arrest to the plane to some shit hole country. That's the way it should be going. permalink parent award report block reply TEXinLA OP 1 points 3 days ago Agreed...
